title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design. An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: The report design does not reject an invalid date/time string input in the 'defaultvalue' field of a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
EB: The report design should reject an invalid date/time string input in the 'defaultvalue' field of a 'DateTime' type report parameter and display an error message to the user.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new report.
3. Add a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
4. In the 'defaultvalue' field of the parameter, type in an invalid date string, for example, '55/66/9999'.
5. Save the report design.
6. Verify that the report design rejects the invalid date/time string and displays an appropriate error message to the user.
